caller_intent: George is confirming the number of crews on his policy and investigating a potential double billing. He also requests an update to his phone number and discusses payroll adjustments for workers' comp insurance.
resolution_steps: Agent verifies the policy details, confirming George has one crew currently.
Explains the billing was a one-time payment of $3,296 to cover a reinstatement, which caused a delay in July billing.
Clarifies the remaining installments are $165.083 due on specific dates.
Updates George's new phone number (749-7048) in the system.
Reviews current payroll ($239,300) and discusses potential adjustments based on current employee earnings (~$1,400/week).
knowledge_required: Payroll calculation methodologies for insurance premiums
systems_referenced: Internal policy administration system (used to check policy details and billing history)
summary: George confirmed policy details with Cody, who explained a one-time payment covered a reinstatement and clarified billing schedules. The agent updated George's phone number and discussed adjusting his workers' comp payroll based on current employee earnings.
